synopsis.text: Masato Hanzawa, the former chairman of the Discipline Committee, seizes the opportunity presented by a student's misplaced keychain to establish the First Lost Item Detective Squad. Yoshikazu Miyano and his friends, eager to take charge of the Discipline Committee after a field trip, find themselves entangled in this new mission. Amidst the search, Shuumei Sasaki grapples with his feelings for Miyano and joins the quest to offer his assistance. However, the mystery deepens as more items vanish, leaving the team no choice but to intensify their investigation. This unaired episode, often considered the thirteenth episode of the main anime, follows the Discipline Committee's transformation into a detective squad, tasked with solving the enigmatic case of the missing keychain.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
